page.title: 04POPULATION AT COMMONSIDE
page.content: LIVING IN THE COMMONSIDE DISRTICT THERE ARE{47}PERSONS IN{19}HOUSEHOLDS. UNDER 10......... 7 UNDER 20......... 7 UNDER 40.........1O UNDER 60........ 19 UNDER 80......... 2 OVER 80......... 3 IT IS 18 MONTHS SINCE THE LAST BIRTH AND 3 YEARS SINCE THE LAST DEATH.AT PRESENT THE THREE{OCTOGENARIANS}ARE IN FAIR HEALTH. THE THREE RETIRED COUPLES AND TWO SINGLE RETIRED PERSONS LIVE QUIETLY OTHERS FOLLOW OWN PURSUITS, MIXING OCCASIONALLY. ATTITUDES TO{SOCIAL CLASS}VARY AS THE OLDER PERSONS AND FARM WORKERS TEND TO BE CLASS CONSCIOUS. HOWEVER AMONGST THE INCOMERS,THE YOUNG AND THE HOTELIERS, THIS IS NOT SO EVIDENT.
